algorithm_technique: Greedy word packing with custom space distribution logic.
problem_summary_simple: Format text into lines of fixed width, justifying each line with even spaces.
problem_summary_technical: Greedy approach to pack words per line, distributing spaces evenly, with special handling for the last line.
key_insights: The core challenge is distributing spaces evenly, prioritizing left side for extra spaces.
The last line is a special case, requiring left justification.
A greedy approach of packing as many words as possible per line is optimal.
